vote.title: A resolution authorizing the preparation of plans and the payment of potential future costs and expenses for the issuances of (1) General Obligation Refunding and Improvement Bonds, Series 2023A in an amount not to exceed $455,880,000; and (2) Combination Tax and Revenue Certificates of Obligation, Series 2023 in an amount not to exceed $61,500,000 - Financing: This action has no cost consideration to the City (see Fiscal Information for potential future costs)
